settings.text: Join our email list for exclusive offers and the latest news.

settings.rebanneddes: Dr. Ruth Roberts’ Happy Paws Affiliate Program is designed for pet lovers with a strong network of pet parents. Earn 10% commission for every sale made through your unique referral link.

settings.affrichtitle: We provide our Happy Paws affiliates with access to a range of marketing materials, including banners, images, and text links, to help you promote our products effectively. Plus, you'll have access to real-time reporting and analytics to track your earnings and optimize your marketing strategy.
settings.affrichhead: Who can join our affiliate program?
settings.rewarddes: Our Happy Paws Affiliate Program by Dr. Ruth Roberts is open to anyone who is passionate about promoting pet health and wellness! Whether you're a pet parent, a pet blogger, pet social media influencer, pet shop owner, or simply a vet or a vet technician with a strong network, you're welcome to join our program.

settings.reworksubtitl: Click on the "Sign Up" button to create your account and fill out the application form.
Our team will review your application and notify you of your approval status via email.
Once approved, you can share your unique referral link with your audience.
Earn a 10% commission on every sale made through your referral link.
Track your earnings and optimize your marketing strategy using our real-time reporting and analytics.

custom_css: h2.reworktitlle {margin-bottom: 0; font-family: "BLT-Heirloom"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 300; font-size: 30px; line-height: 40px; text-align: center; color: #000000;}

settings.reworkhead: Join the Happy Paws Affiliate Community
settings.rewworkdes: All you need to do is sign up for our program online and start promoting our products to your audience.

settings.afficonsubtitl: Our organic pet supplements and products are made from the finest natural ingredients and are scientifically formulated to promote pet health and wellness.
By promoting Happy Paws' organic pet supplements, you'll be contributing to the well-being of pets everywhere, and helping pet owners take the best possible care of their furry friends.
Our team is always available to support our affiliates and answer any questions they may have. We're committed to helping our affiliates succeed and earn maximum commission.

settings.afficonhead: Promote Pet Health and Wellness with Happy Paws Affiliate Program

settings.affimgdes: Our Happy Paws pet health affiliates program is free and easy to join, with no setup fees or hidden costs. Plus, there's no limit to how much you can earn!

settings.faqdes: The Happy Paws Affiliate Program is a partnership program that focuses on promoting pet health and wellness, where affiliates can earn a commission on sales generated through their exclusive referral link for our range of natural pet supplements, pet wellness courses, and our comprehensive Holistic Pet Health Coaching Program.
settings.faqbtn: What is the Happy Paws Affiliate Program?

settings.faqdes: Anyone can join our program, whether you are a pet owner, pet blogger, social media influencer, a pet groomer, vet, vet technician or simply someone who loves promoting high-quality pet products.
settings.faqbtn: Who can join the Happy Paws Affiliate Program?

settings.faqdes: Affiliates earn a 10% commission on all sales made through their referral linkn
settings.faqbtn: How much commission do affiliates earn?

settings.faqdes: Signing up is quick and easy. Simply visit our affiliate sign-up page and fill in your details. Once you are approved, you will receive your unique referral link and marketing materials to start promoting our products.
settings.faqbtn: How do I join the Happy Paws Affiliate Program?

settings.faqdes: We pay our affiliates through PayPal on a monthly basis, provided that the commission balance reaches the minimum threshold of $25.
settings.faqbtn: How do I get paid for my commissions?

settings.faqdes: Yes, you can promote our products on social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and others. Just be sure to follow our guidelines and terms of service.
settings.faqbtn: Can I promote Happy Paws products on my social media accounts?

settings.faqdes: We provide a range of high-quality marketing materials, including banners, images, and text links. You can choose the materials that best fit your style and audience.
settings.faqbtn: What kind of marketing materials do you provide?

settings.faqdes: No, you do not need to have a website to join our program. However, having a website or blog can help you promote our products more effectively and reach a larger audience.
settings.faqbtn: Do I need to have a website to join the Happy Paws Affiliate Program?

settings.faqdes: We aim to review and approve all affiliate applications within 24-48 hours. Once your account is approved, you will receive an email notification with further instructions.
settings.faqbtn: How long does it take for my affiliate account to be approved?

settings.faqdes: No, there are no costs involved in joining our program. It is completely free to sign up and start promoting our products. The commission transaction fees will be covered by you.
settings.faqbtn: Are there any costs involved in joining the Happy Paws Affiliate Program?

settings.faqdes: We provide our affiliates with access to a user-friendly dashboard where you can track your earnings, referrals, clicks, and other key metrics in real-time.
settings.faqbtn: How do I track my commission earnings and referrals?

settings.faqdes: No, using your own referral link to purchase products for yourself is not allowed and will result in the commission being voided.
settings.faqbtn: Can I use my own referral link to purchase Happy Paws products for myself?

settings.faqdes: If a customer returns a product, the commission for that sale will be deducted from your earnings.
settings.faqbtn: What happens if a customer returns a product that I referred them to?

settings.faqdes: Yes, you can change the marketing materials you use at any time, and we encourage our affiliates to test different materials to find what works best for them.
settings.faqbtn: Can I change the marketing materials I use once I've started promoting Happy Paws products?

settings.faqdes:
We offer dedicated support to all our affiliates, including access to our support team and a range of resources to help you succeed in promoting our products.

If you have any further questions about our Affiliate Program, please don't hesitate to contact us.
settings.faqbtn: What kind of support do you offer to your affiliates?

settings.addhead: By joining our program, you'll have the chance to align with a trusted and respected pet brand, help promote pet wellness, and earn generous commission in the process.

settings.reorderdes: Join our email list for exclusive offers and the latest news.
